message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. Considering its value, I suggest a price of $100. Let me know if this works for you or if you'd like to make a counteroffer.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. I would like to propose a price of $85 for the product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in our product. I would like to counter your offer with a price of $90 for the product. Let me know if this works better for you or if you would like to make another counteroffer.
I appreciate your response, Alice. I would like to counter your offer with a price of $82 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. Considering the value of our product and your interest, I would like to counter with a price of $88 for the product. Please let me know if this is acceptable or if you would like to make another counteroffer.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I would like to counter your offer with a price of $85 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to meet my expectations. Considering the value of our product, I would like to counter with a price of $86 for the product. Please let me know if this is acceptable or if you would like to make another counteroffer.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I would like to counter your offer with a price of $84 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your position and am willing to negotiate further. Considering the value of our product and your offer, I would like to counter with a price of $85 for the product. Please let me know if this is acceptable or if you would like to make another counteroffer.
